description: Led frontend development for an enterprise customer service platform serving 1,000+ agents. Delivered ~$65K/month in operational value, reduced manual coding time by 30% with custom CLI tools, and improved workflow efficiency by 12%. Tech stack: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind.

Built a multi-module railway engineering management system using Vue and TypeScript. Optimized load time by 45% (4.2s to 2.3s), reduced UI code duplication by 25% with reusable components, and established modern code quality standards.
